name: Honest Company, Inc.
description: The Honest Company, Inc. is a consumer goods company that specializes in creating safe, effective, and eco-friendly products for families. Founded in 2011 by actress Jessica Alba and a group of entrepreneurs, Honest aims to provide consumers with non-toxic household and personal care products that are free from harmful chemicals. The company offers a wide range of products, including diapers, wipes, skincare, and cleaning supplies, all crafted with an emphasis on sustainability and transparency. Honest has established itself as a trusted brand in the health and wellness space, appealing to health-conscious consumers seeking to avoid potentially harmful ingredients. The company's mission is to empower people to live a healthy, happy life by providing products that they can feel good about using. Honest is also committed to social responsibility, engaging in various initiatives to give back to communities and promote environmental sustainability. With its focus on innovation and quality, Honest continues to expand its product lines while staying true to its core values of safety, sustainability, and transparency.

seo.meta_title: The Honest Company, Inc. | Safe and Eco-Friendly Products
seo.meta_description: Explore The Honest Company, Inc. for safe, effective, and eco-friendly products. Discover our range of baby, personal care, and household items.

faq.question: What does The Honest Company specialize in?
faq.answer: The Honest Company specializes in safe, eco-friendly household and personal care products.

faq.question: Who founded The Honest Company?
faq.answer: The Honest Company was founded by Jessica Alba and a group of entrepreneurs.

faq.question: Where is The Honest Company headquartered?
faq.answer: The Honest Company is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Honest offer?
faq.answer: Honest offers baby products, personal care items, and household cleaning supplies.

faq.question: When was The Honest Company founded?
faq.answer: The Honest Company was founded in 2011.
